story.author: CoolMonkey24
story.headline: Lizard people, scaling up in society

article.p: Do you know any lizard people? Have you ever seen a person blink with a second set of eyelids?
Think hard. Lizard people are all around us. They infiltrate society slowly, making their way into public offices.
This may sound scary, but itâ€™s not all bad. Just think about how many mosquitos they will eat during the summer.
